meanings.definition: The state or quality of being loony or crazy.
meanings.sent1: Her looninesses was evident to everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The looninesses of the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: His looninesses sometimes led to unexpected adventures.
meanings.sent4: The looninesses of the party was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The looninesses of the clown made the children giggle.

meanings.definition: The behavior or actions of someone who is eccentric or mentally unstable.
meanings.sent1: The professor's looninesses puzzled his students.
meanings.sent2: Her looninesses often brought a sense of unpredictability.
meanings.sent3: The looninesses of the cat chasing its tail entertained the family.
meanings.sent4: His looninesses was like a whirlwind of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The looninesses of the artist inspired awe in the viewers.
